thread.section_title: News Article Archive from M03 22, 2018 - Wsj.com
thread.title: Who Is the Real Atticus Finch?

author: Joseph Crespino
title: Who Is the Real Atticus Finch?
text:
One of the icons of American literature, Atticus Finch of “To Kill a Mockingbird,” got a disconcerting revamp in 2015 when author Harper Lee published her long-lost first novel, “Go Set a Watchman.” The crusading lawyer, who defends a wrongly accused black man in the beloved novel, appeared in a less heroic light in the earlier work. An adaptation of “To Kill a Mockingbird” is now planned for Broadway, but a lawsuit over it has rekindled the question: Which version of Atticus Finch is the right one?
Ms. Lee’s estate argues...
